Articles.Content:
Hello all, I've added a planet to KSP using kopernicus... but as I don't have 1.05 anymore, I can't update the scaledspace appearance (ie, mapview).

Basically I took the heightmap files and such for mars, and made a new planet using them (roughly 1/10th scale) that orbits at Kerbin's pseudo-L4 point.

Then I offset the heightmap, and gave it an ocean, and a thicker O2 containing atmosphere. I think its great... much less dull than most of the stock planets, and a fun target for a first interplanetary mission (the transfer window is always open ).

The only problem is that it looks just like Mars in the mapview, with no sign of the ocean.

Edited May 15, 2016 by KerikBalm
